mapper.select: select * from inst order by inst_no desc
select count(*) from usr where usr_id = #{usrId}
select u.usr_no, u.usr_nm, u.usr_authrt_no, u.usr_id, u.usr_pswd, u.usr_stts_no, u.rprs_img, a.usr_authrt_nm from usr u join usr_authrt a on u.usr_authrt_no = a.usr_authrt_no where usr_Id = #{usrId}

select u.usr_no, u.usr_id, u.usr_pswd, u.usr_nm, u.usr_rrno, u.usr_telno, u.usr_eml, u.inst_no, u.dept_no, u.ibps_no, u.role_no, u.usr_authrt_no, u.usr_stts_no, u.lgn_fail_cnt, u.usr_join_dt, u.usr_whdwl_dt, a.usr_authrt_nm, i.inst_nm from usr u join usr_authrt a on u.usr_authrt_no = a.usr_authrt_no join inst i on u.inst_no = i.inst_no where usr_Id = #{usrId}

SELECT usr.usr_no, usr.usr_id, usr.usr_nm, usr.usr_rrno || '******' as usr_rrno, usr.usr_telno, usr.usr_eml, inst.inst_nm, dept.dept_nm, ibps.ibps_nm, role.role_nm, usr_authrt.usr_authrt_nm, usr_stts.usr_stts_nm, usr.usr_join_dt, usr.usr_whdwl_dt FROM usr JOIN inst ON usr.inst_no = inst.inst_no JOIN dept ON usr.dept_no = dept.dept_no JOIN ibps ON usr.ibps_no = ibps.ibps_no JOIN role ON usr.role_no = role.role_no JOIN usr_authrt ON usr.usr_authrt_no = usr_authrt.usr_authrt_no JOIN usr_stts ON usr.usr_stts_no = usr_stts.usr_stts_no WHERE usr.usr_no = #{usrNo}

SELECT DISTINCT sr_no, sr_ttl FROM ( SELECT sr.sr_no, sr_rqst.sr_ttl FROM sr JOIN sr_rqst ON sr.sr_rqst_no = sr_rqst.sr_rqst_no WHERE sr.pic_usr_no = #{usrNo} UNION SELECT sr.sr_no, sr_rqst.sr_ttl FROM sr JOIN sr_rqst ON sr.sr_rqst_no = sr_rqst.sr_rqst_no JOIN sr_trnsf_plan srt ON sr.sr_no = srt.sr_no WHERE srt.usr_no = #{usrNo} UNION SELECT sr.sr_no, sr_rqst.sr_ttl FROM sr JOIN sr_rqst ON sr.sr_rqst_no = sr_rqst.sr_rqst_no JOIN sr_prgrs srp ON sr.sr_no = srp.sr_no WHERE srp.usr_no = #{usrNo} )
